scripts.up:dev: pm2 delete blockgame-server-dev blockgame-ui-dev || true; lsof -ti:7001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; lsof -ti:7000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only blockgame-server-dev,blockgame-ui-dev
scripts.up:prod: bun run build && pm2 delete blockgame-server-prod blockgame-ui-prod || true; lsof -ti:7001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; lsof -ti:7000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only blockgame-server-prod,blockgame-ui-prod
scripts.up:dev:ui: pm2 delete blockgame-ui-dev || true; lsof -ti:7000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only blockgame-ui-dev
scripts.up:dev:server: pm2 delete blockgame-server-dev || true; lsof -ti:7001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only blockgame-server-dev
scripts.up:prod:ui: bun run build:ui && pm2 delete blockgame-ui-prod || true; lsof -ti:7000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only blockgame-ui-prod
scripts.up:prod:server: bun run build:server && pm2 delete blockgame-server-prod || true; lsof -ti:7001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only blockgame-server-prod
scripts.build: bun run build:server && bun run build:ui
scripts.typecheck: bun run typecheck:server && bun run typecheck:ui
